messages.subject: Re: vacation time
messages.msgSnippet: Have a great time Mary & Qacei! I can t wait to hear all about your adventure. :-) Shawna said to ask Qacei to send her a postcard if she can. :-) ~ Joanne ~
messages.messageBody:
Have a great time Mary & Qacei! I can't wait to hear all about your
adventure. :-)

Shawna said to ask Qacei to send her a postcard if she can. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

wrote:

messages.subject: vacation time
messages.msgSnippet: I m going no mail for the next month or so while Qacei and I head off on our Shakespeare/Europe extravaganza. I ll be back at the end of August. Happy
messages.messageBody:
I'm going no mail for the next month or so while Qacei and I head off
on our Shakespeare/Europe extravaganza. I'll be back at the end of August.

Happy unschooling. :o)

~Mary
